subject: #SSN5934
description_text:
Hello. I would like to cancel my order #SSN5934. I purchased and received
my HS PRO shifter and realized the this was the wrong desk clamp for it. Do
you guys have a desk clamp for the HS PRO shifter? Thank you for your help

conversations.body_text: Hi Dingus,  The desk clamp in this link is compatible with the HS Pro.            https://www.simsonn.com/products/desktop-fixed-1

Ok. Thank you. Were you able to cancel the order?

On Sat, Jan 10, 2026, 2:28 a.m. service@simsonn.com
Hi Dingus,    Alright, I've intercepted it for you.

Hello. Still have not received a refund, or the package if it is not being
refunded. Could I have an update please?

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026, 2:02 a.m. service@simsonn.com
